description:
The Eclipse Foundation has announced two advancements in open source AI development tools and IDEs. Spearheaded by AI-native tool development firm EclipseSource, these latest releases aim to give developers greater control over their AI integration. The new offerings include: Mike Milinkovich, Executive Director of the Eclipse Foundation, said: “Proprietary AI development platforms are locking developers... Read more »

The post Eclipse Foundation unveils open source AI development tools appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Eclipse Foundation unveils open source AI development tools
